channel.title: [562] new cache link [562]
channel.description:
hey i current have a cache link which is broken and iv never did it before. i currently have a link to a new 562 cache i just don't know how they talk like putting it on my website i dont' have the slightest clue
this is in my client setting.java file please help [code] public static String getCacheDir() { return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.rspsCache2"; //only change this if you edit cache } public static final String cacheLink = "http://armadyll.info/alex/cache2.zip"; //make sure it zip public static final int cacheRevision = 3; //change this if you edit cache [/code]

item.title: [562] new cache link [562]
item.dc:creator: @couttiiee couttiiee
item.description:
@couttiiee wrote:

hey i just went into my computer and got the cache which i was using
do i need to zip all of the things inside?
there all .dat

nfpf1u.png748×473

Read full topic

item.title: [562] new cache link [562]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

you need to zip the INSIDE of the cache folder. so everything on the INSIDE gets zipped but not the main cache folder itself.

Now, you need to upload to like dropbox. (use public folder)

you will replace the cache link you currently see with the one on dropbox.

Read full topic
